name: Check service restart
tagline: A plugin for Icinga and Nagios that warns you if any services need to be restarted after applying package updates
body:
# Install plugin

## Icinga, Nagios

Add the snippet below to /etc/icinga/objects/commands.cfg or /etc/nagios/objects/commands.cfg:

```
define command{
    command_name    check_service_restart
    command_line    $USER1$/check_service_restart
}
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
